abstract: ECONOMIC DATA Reports will include retail sales for June, the Producer Price Index for June and business inventories for May (Tuesday); the Consumer Price Index for June, industrial production and capacity utilization for June and the minutes of the June 24 meeting of the Federal Open Market Committee (Wednesday); the Philadelphia Federal Reserve manufacturing index for April (Thursday); and housing starts for June (Friday).
snippet: ECONOMIC DATA Reports will include retail sales for June, the Producer Price Index for June and business inventories for May (Tuesday); the Consumer Price Index for June, industrial production and capacity utilization for June and the minutes of t...
lead_paragraph: ECONOMIC DATA Reports will include retail sales for June, the Producer Price Index for June and business inventories for May (Tuesday); the Consumer Price Index for June, industrial production and capacity utilization for June and the minutes of the June 24 meeting of the Federal Open Market Committee (Wednesday); the Philadelphia Federal Reserve manufacturing index for April (Thursday); and housing starts for June (Friday).
